cardSubtitle: School of Informatics, Computer Science and Information Systems
cardDetailedText: Enrolled at Nagoya University as a Computer Science and Information Systems major.

title: 2022–present
cardDetailedText: Leads projects turning sensor streams into fast surrogate simulations for industry partners.
Built and maintained the official festival website.

title: Mar 2024
cardDetailedText: Represented Nagoya University in a cultural and academic exchange program.

title: Summer 2024
cardDetailedText: Analyzed large-scale production data to streamline manufacturing workflows with AI.

title: Jul–Aug 2024
cardSubtitle: University of Science and Technology of China (USTC)
cardDetailedText: Developed a GNN that achieved near-benchmark accuracy in predicting formation energies of Mb-Nb-Ta-W high-entropy alloys.
